data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kalmar.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Kalmar in the half of Varbergs.
At Guldfageln Arena, Kalmar are penalized for being offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Kalmar goal kick.
In the minute 4, Varbergs awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Kalmar in the half of Varbergs.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Kalmar at Guldfageln Arena.
Throw-in Varbergs.
In Kalmar a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 8, Varbergs awarded a free kick in their own half.
Varbergs's Junes Barny breaks free at Guldfageln Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Kalmar have a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Ball safe as Kalmar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Kalmar in their own half.
Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Varbergs in their own half.
Varbergs to take a throw-in in Kalmar territory.
Free kick for Kalmar in their own half.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Kalmar in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
In the minute 18, Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Kalmar just outside Varbergs's area.
Romarinho of Kalmar smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 20, Kristoffer Karlsson awards the away team a throw-in.
At Guldfageln Arena, Douglas Bergqvist has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Varbergs.
Varbergs are caught offside.
In the minute 22, Varbergs are in shooting range from this free kick.
Kalmar needs to be cautious. Varbergs have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Kalmar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Kalmar in their own half.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards the away team a throw-in.
Kalmar have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Kalmar.
Throw-in Varbergs.
Throw-in for Varbergs at Guldfageln Arena.
In the minute 27, Kristoffer Karlsson signals a Kalmar throw-in in Varbergs's half.
Varbergs awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Kalmar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Varbergs's half?
Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Robin Book (Varbergs) has received a yellow card from Kristoffer Karlsson.
Kalmar to take a throw-in in Varbergs territory.
In the minute 30, Throw-in high up the field for Kalmar in Kalmar.
Throw-in for Kalmar close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Kalmar.
In the minute 31, Varbergs awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Kalmar.
Goal kick for Varbergs at Guldfageln Arena.
In the minute 36, Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Varbergs in their own half.
Varbergs pushes forward through Astrit Seljmani, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Kalmar in their own half.
In the minute 38, Romarinho (Kalmar) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for Varbergs in their own half.
Free kick Kalmar.
In the minute 40, Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Varbergs in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Varbergs capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kalmar's half?
In the minute 41, Varbergs's Robin Book gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards Kalmar a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kalmar in their own half.
In the minute 42, Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Varbergs.
Throw-in for Varbergs at Guldfageln Arena.
In Kalmar a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 44, Varbergs have a dangerous throw-in.
Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a Kalmar throw-in in Varbergs's half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Kalmar.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Can Kalmar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Varbergs's half?
In the minute 47, Free kick for Varbergs in their own half.
Throw-in for Varbergs in the half of Kalmar.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Kalmar in the half of Varbergs.
Goal! Isak Magnusson gives Kalmar a 1-0 lead in Kalmar.
That's a fine assist from Filip Sachpekidis.
In the minute 50, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards the away team a throw-in.
Kalmar are coming forward and Isak Jansson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 52, Varbergs have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
Varbergs awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a Kalmar throw-in in Varbergs's half.
In the minute 55, Kalmar have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
In Kalmar, Erik Israelsson (Kalmar) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Varbergs drive upfield and Astrit Seljmani gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kalmar defender.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Varbergs.
Varbergs awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a throw-in for Varbergs, close to Kalmar's area.
In the minute 60, Kristoffer Karlsson awards Kalmar a goal kick.
Varbergs to take a throw-in in Kalmar territory.
Can Varbergs capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kalmar's half?
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Varbergs in their own half.
Gustaf Norlin is on a sub for Luke Le Roux for Varbergs.
Joakim Persson is making the team's second substitution at Guldfageln Arena with Robin Tranberg replacing Anton Liljenback.
In the minute 64, Free kick Varbergs.
In Kalmar a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal! Varbergs go level at 1-1 through Jon Birkfeldt in Kalmar.
In the minute 67, Romarinho for Kalmar gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Varbergs goal kick.
Goal kick for Varbergs at Guldfageln Arena.
In the minute 68, Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Varbergs.
Varbergs have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
Corner awarded to Varbergs.
In the minute 70, In Kalmar, Robin Book of Varbergs is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Varbergs.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kalmar.
In the minute 70, Nanne Bergstrand (Kalmar) is making a third substitution, with Edvin Crona replacing Filip Sachpekidis.
In the minute 71, Kalmar are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
The home team have replaced Isak Jansson with Geir Herrem. This is the first substitution made today by Nanne Bergstrand.
York Raphael is replacing Isak Magnusson for Kalmar at Guldfageln Arena.
In Kalmar Varbergs drive forward through Robin Tranberg. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can Varbergs get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kalmar's half?
In the minute 74, Throw-in Kalmar.
In Kalmar Kalmar attack through York Raphael. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kalmar.
In the minute 76, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Varbergs have a goal kick.
Free kick for Kalmar in the half of Varbergs.
In the minute 79, Kalmar have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
Varbergs awarded a free kick in their own half.
Varbergs have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
In the minute 82, Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
Free kick for Varbergs in their own half.
In Kalmar a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Varbergs in their own half.
Kalmar make their fourth substitution with Viktor Elm replacing Sebastian Ring.
Corner awarded to Varbergs.
In the minute 86, Ball goes out of play for a Kalmar goal kick.
Ball safe as Kalmar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Varbergs.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Kalmar close to the penalty box.
In the minute 88, Kalmar's Geir Herrem is on target but unsuccessful.
The away team replace Robin Book with Albin Winbo.
The away team have replaced Junes Barny with Erion Sadiku. This is the fourth substitution made today by Joakim Persson.
Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Varbergs's Astrit Seljmani misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Kalmar at Guldfageln Arena.
Free kick Kalmar.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Kalmar in the half of Varbergs.
Throw-in high up the field for Varbergs in Kalmar.
Romarinho returns to the field for Kalmar after picking up a slight injury.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
Throw-in for Varbergs in the half of Kalmar.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a Varbergs throw-in in Kalmar's half.
Can Varbergs get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kalmar's half?
Free kick Kalmar.
Kalmar advance rapidly upfield but Kristoffer Karlsson blows for offside.
Albin Winbo for Varbergs gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards Kalmar a goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
Erion Sadiku is booked for the away team.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Romarinho.
Joakim Lindner for Varbergs has been booked by Kristoffer Karlsson and receives a first yellow card.
